a kind, a type, a way: to put out, to take out
to droop, to sag, to stretch
a law, an act, a legislation
a true story, a real-life story
to induce, to prompt, to stir up
a foothold, a scaffold, a steppingstone
an opening of the mouth; an end of a word
a fancy, a fantasy, a daydream
a fancy, a fantasy, a daydream
